Thanks for submitting this new change. 

 

@Dinh, Tan <mailto:Tan.Dinh@CIBC.com>  would you be able to help review and accept CHG1479423? This new change would remove assignment to the incorrect Hashi SPN “D-IS0001292-hvaultd-static-spns-AP” as per the CHG1473861, and will assign the custom entra role to the correct Hashi SPN “D-IS0001292-hvaultp-static-spns-AP”.

 

Thanks,
